text: Jo nagued (ej musrikon), ki agar ʙar mo niz kitoʙ nozil mesud, (cunon ki ʙar jahudu nasoro nozil sud), ʙehtar az onon ʙa rohi hidojat meraftem. Hamono ʙar sumo niz az coniʙi Parvardigoraton daleli ravsan va hidojat ʙa sui haq rahmat ʙa ummat faro rasid. Va kist sitamgortar az kase, ki ojoti Allohro duruƣ pindorad va az onho ruj ʙigardonad? Ba zudi kasonero, ki az ojoti Mo ruj megardonand, ʙa saʙaʙi in rujgardoniason az ojoti Mo, dar otasi cahannam ʙa azoʙi ʙad cazo xohem dod
